articles.content:

articles.title: SpaceX's CRS-25 cargo launch pushed back to July 11 - Space.com
articles.description: Technicians need to replace a part on SpaceX's Dragon capsule before the mission can lift off.
articles.content:
The launch of SpaceX's next cargo mission has been pushed back at least two more weeks, to no earlier than July 11.
